name: Doctors Without Borders (Médecins Sans Frontières)
description: Provides medical care and humanitarian assistance in crisis-affected areas worldwide.

name: Save the Children
description: Works to improve the lives of children through education, health, and protection programs globally.

name: Amnesty International
description: Advocates for human rights and campaigns against injustices worldwide.

name: World Food Programme (WFP)
description: Addresses hunger and provides food assistance in emergencies and vulnerable communities.

name: CARE
description: Fights global poverty and provides disaster relief and development programs.

name: Human Rights Watch
description: Conducts research and advocacy on human rights abuses worldwide.

name: Oxfam
description: Works to end poverty and injustice by providing support and advocacy globally.

name: UNICEF (United Nations International Children's Emergency Fund)
description: Protects the rights and well-being of children worldwide through various programs.

name: Habitat for Humanity International
description: Builds affordable housing and empowers communities in need worldwide.

name: World Wildlife Fund (WWF)
description: Works to conserve nature and address environmental challenges globally.

name: Mercy Corps
description: Provides humanitarian aid and empowers communities in crisis-affected areas.

name: Plan International
description: Advances children's rights and equality for girls in developing countries.

name: International Rescue Committee (IRC)
description: Supports refugees and vulnerable communities affected by conflict and disaster.

name: CARE International
description: Fights global poverty and provides humanitarian aid and development programs.

name: Transparency International
description: Works to combat corruption and promote transparency in government and institutions globally.

name: Water.org
description: Addresses the global water crisis by providing access to safe water and sanitation.

name: Room to Read
description: Promotes literacy and gender equality in education through programs in Asia and Africa.

name: International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies
description: Supports disaster response, recovery, and community resilience worldwide.

name: Mercy Ships
description: Operates hospital ships that provide free medical care and community development in developing nations.

name: Heifer International
description: Works to end hunger and poverty by providing livestock and training to communities in need.
